official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under part B of Medicare for routine Papanicolaou test for the diagnosis of uterine cancer.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to extend coverage to include expenses incurred in providing a Papanicolaou test for the diagnosis of uterine cancer, if the individual receiving the test has not had such a test on a routine basis during the preceding six months.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage under part B of Medicare for routine Papanicolaou test for the diagnosis of uterine cancer.
